page.title: 17HEREFORD the nearest city
page.content: Hereford has a population of approximately 47,000. In Hereford there are many historical buildings including the Cathedral, which was originally built in AD792. Also in Hereford is the Worlds largest Cider maker H.P.Bulmers.Tesco have recently built a superstore. Hereford also has one of the most important livestock markets in the country. Hereford has been the birth place for many famous people such as Sir Edward Elgar who lived here for the best part of his creative years. Nell Gwynne was born here in what was then called Pipe Lane,it has since been renamed as Gwynne Street.
